body: Ericsson Overview Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment & services to mobile & fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, & more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business & society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people & society to help shape a more sustainable world.We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture & an innovative & engaging environment where employees enhance their potential every day. Our employees live our vision, core values & guiding principles. They share a passion to win & a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning & growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge & skills necessary to reach your career goals. Job Summary •	Responsible for analyzing, designing and developing viable end-to-end technical solutions for the Managed Services business with a primary focus on GSC Romania Operational business.•	Responsible for profitable business for Ericsson, by translating customer needs and business requirements into detailed technical solutions and proposals supporting the integration and deployment of such solutions in production. Responsibilities & Tasks •	Scope, define & design solution offerings; driving end-to-end technical solutions : connectivity , feasibility studies, applications ticketing, performance systems , etc ...•	Analyze customer technology, define business requirements & participate in risk analysis•	Work with different teams on planning activities as well as delivery activities•	Develop technical presentations, proposals and perform customer presentations•	Support deployment of technical solution•	Participate in knowledge transfer, documentation and information sharing•	Stay abreast of on new technology/technical areas & share information about solution to enable customer competence build Qualifications & Experience Requirements: •	University degree and/or Masters with a major in Telecom, IT or equivalent (Computer Science or Electrical Engineering)•	5 years’ experience in working with Network Operations and / or System Integration•	Good knowledge of process management frameworks (ITIL, eTOM) with ITIL v3 Foundations certification - IT Service Manager would be a plus.•	Good understanding of telecom and IT standards (ITU-T, ISO standards, NGOSS/ Frameworx)•	Good understanding of the application development lifecycle•	Familiar with project management methodologies (prior training in PROPS-C is required)•	Focused on continuous improvement and increase effectiveness with knowledge and prior experience in deploying TQM systems, Six Sigma and/or Lean Six•	Deep understanding of the MS delivery business requirements and Ericsson Service Delivery Portfolio for Managed Services and Hosting•	Good understanding of OSS/ Network Management and Business Support System solution components and technologies;•	Advanced technical knowledge of Telecom environment: mobile networks in general (2G, 3G, 4G) as well as different technological areas like RAN, Core networks, TX, VAS•	Deep understanding of service providers / operators business requirements.•	Demonstrates research and investigation skills, systematically analyzes and identifies causes and effect, anticipates obstacles and strives ahead, develops conclusions based on facts;•	Understands and uses presentation techniques to structure and present an argument so that the desired result is attained.•	Good written and spoken English;
title: System Architect
